NetSparkleUpdater.​Configurations.​JSONConfiguration
NetSparkleUpdater.​Configurations.​Configuration
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​Configurations.​JSONConfiguration

A configuration subclsas that can save and load its data from a JSON file that lives on disk. This type of Configuration can be used on any operating system where you can read/write files.

Variables
_savePath
private string _savePath
Functions
JSONConfiguration
public JSONConfiguration(
IAssemblyAccessor assemblyAccessor
)

Constructor for a configuration that saves and loads its configuration data to and from a JSON file that resides on disk. This Configuration can be used on any operating system.

Parameter
assemblyAccessor
IAssemblyAccessor

Object that accesses version, title, etc. info for the application you would like to check for updates for

JSONConfiguration
public JSONConfiguration(
IAssemblyAccessor assemblyAccessor,
string savePath
)

Constructor for a configuration that saves and loads its configuration data to and from a JSON file that resides on disk. This Configuration can be used on any operating system.

Parameters
assemblyAccessor
IAssemblyAccessor

Object that accesses version, title, etc. info for the application you would like to check for updates for

savePath
string

location to save the JSON configuration data to; can be null or empty string.  If not null or empty string, must represent a valid path on disk (directories must already be created).  This class will take care of creating/overwriting the file at that path if necessary.

Exceptions
NetSparkleException

Thrown when the configuration data cannot be read or saved

TouchProfileTime
public override void TouchProfileTime()
TouchCheckTime
public override void TouchCheckTime()
SetVersionToSkip
public override void SetVersionToSkip(
string version
)
Reload
public override void Reload()
GetSavePath
public virtual string GetSavePath()

Get the full file path to the location and file name on disk where the JSON configuration data should be saved.  By default, stored in  in the "NetSparkleUpdater" folder in the "data.json" file.

Exceptions
NetSparkleException

Thrown when the assembly accessor does not have the company or product name information available

LoadValuesFromPath
private bool LoadValuesFromPath(
string saveLocation
)

Load configuration values from the json file at the given path.

Parameter
saveLocation
string

the configuration file location

Returns

true if the items were loaded, false if the file didn't exist or was unable to be loaded

Store the configuration information to disk as json

Parameter

string

the save path to the json file

Returns
